titles.title: To make improvements in the enactment of title 41, United States Code, into a positive law title and to improve the Code.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 112-662.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 159.

action.text: Mr. Smith (TX) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 6080.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 9/11/2012--Passed House without amendment. Revises provisions in titles of the U.S. Code relating to public contracts to correspond to title 41 of such Code as enacted into positive law.
